title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - REVISED
description: Revise the requirements for the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool, including potential data sources (e.g., project management tools, task logs, employee calendars), analysis methods (e.g., machine learning algorithms, statistical analysis, workflow analysis), output formats (e.g., visualizations, reports, real-time alerts), and consider edge cases such as holidays, vacations, or employee departures/arrivals. Also, define the interface for users to opt-in, customize their preferences, and adjust settings according to their roles or teams. Furthermore, discuss potential integration with existing systems and APIs, data privacy considerations, and security measures. Lastly, outline a plan for ongoing maintenance, updates, and improvements based on user feedback.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, data storage (considering scalable solutions like cloud services), security considerations (including data encryption and access controls), and scalability strategies. The design should also consider potential future integrations with other systems.

title: Design Data Collection and Storage
description: Design the data collection and storage mechanisms for capturing work patterns and task assignments. The design should consider data privacy (including GDPR and HIPAA if applicable), security, compliance with relevant regulations, scalability, performance, and data retention policies. It should employ encryption methods to secure sensitive data and be flexible to accommodate potential future expansions and changes in workflows. Additionally, the design should address anonymization of user data for privacy concerns, the use of hashing algorithms for password storage, and regular audits to ensure compliance with regulations.

title: Design Analysis and Reporting (Revised)
description: Update the design of the analysis algorithms and reporting mechanisms for identifying potential overwork or uneven task distribution. The revised design should take into account factors such as task duration, complexity, deadlines, employee workload capacity, and task priorities. The revised reporting mechanism should offer clear visualizations, actionable insights, and prioritized suggestions to aid managers and employees in balancing workloads effectively. Also, consider integrating the system with existing project management tools for smooth data exchange. Additionally, suggest ways to optimize the design for scalability and performance as the user base grows. (Revised due to feedback from the team). Include a section discussing potential security concerns and suggested mitigation strategies. Finally, provide documentation for each module of the revised system.

title: Design User Interface - Revised
description: Revise the user interface design for configuring the tool, viewing reports, and managing opt-in settings. Include clear instructions, intuitive navigation, and accessible design principles. Integrate with the project's Design System where applicable. Update the UI design to ensure it is responsive across different screen sizes and devices.

title: Plan Security and Privacy Measures
description: Develop a comprehensive plan for ensuring data privacy and security, including access controls, data encryption, and incident response procedures.

title: Plan Deployment and Operations
description:
Develop a comprehensive plan for deploying and operating the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool. The plan should include infrastructure requirements, monitoring and logging strategies, maintenance schedules, disaster recovery procedures, a clear handoff process to ensure smooth transition between development, testing, and production environments, and considerations for scalability and security.

Dependencies: Design System Architecture

title: Create Test Plan (Revised)
description: Develop a comprehensive and detailed test plan for validating the functionality, performance, and security of the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool. The plan should include test cases, expected results, test environment setup, any necessary prerequisites, and consider edge cases to ensure thorough testing. Additionally, consider integrating the test plan with our existing continuous integration/continuous deployment pipeline for automated testing.

title: Develop Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool. The documentation should cover installation, configuration, usage scenarios, troubleshooting, API references (if applicable). Ensure that the documentation is well-structured, easy to understand, and up-to-date with the latest features and changes. Include examples where appropriate and consider different user skill levels. Also, ensure the documentation is accessible and inclusive.
